text: I’ve set up a custom object graphql query and selected it as my dynamic source. The url has the slug `about/[:dynamic-slug]` string in it. No matter what i do it 404's. Anyone running into this today?

PSA… you can’t have an alias in your query for the main piece of data used for the `dynamic_page_data_instance`

I had to change the line `location: p_locations(` to `p_locations(` … that was a hard 30 minute lesson to learn :cry:
